content:
If you want to go out again,
exchange some Lumia bottles at <color=#8AAB4B>Loomi Shop</color>
on your TV box, then come back to me.
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
<color=#8AAB4B>Lumia</color> as you know,
is a substance that enables travel between world bubbles,
but there are still many world bubbles that aren't connected by Lumia.
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: Don't worry~, we're not going to roam around aimlessly. Mobai gave you a <color=#8AAB4B>Jar of Lumia</color>, right?
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Lumia charging complete, ready for departure.
Have a pleasant journey, may the light guide your way!
{敬礼}!
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Ahh?!
You scared me! I thought Mo Bai was tricking me.
You clearly have it after all.
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
While it's not great for living, there's tons of lumber,
loads of minerals, and treasures left behind by travelers—
basically, it's a perfect spot for scavenging.
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Alright!
Just let me know whenever you want to head out!
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
If you want to head out...
You could go talk to Mobai about the "Ecological Vitality Survey."
That might lead to finding new Lumia Bottles, right?
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: He said it was because they were short on supplies and "had no other choice"? I think it's because when I took you all out that time, he got a whole new perspective on my driving skills!
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: Let me be a couch potato for a bit longer...
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Got it!
I'll use the Lumia flask
to power up your car.
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
It's all for fun~!
I love it—the more, the better~!
We can explore even more distant, unknown places.
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
<color=#8AAB4B>Lumia Bottle</color>!
It's basically storing Lumia in a bottle,
making it easy to trade, carry around, and charge your car whenever you need!
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: What's a Lumia bottle?
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
These vehicles can freely travel through the Sky River,
making them essential for journeys
and gathering expeditions.
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Mobai says, "Meeting Neighbors is written in the stars. 
Perhaps after getting to know them better, our <color=#8AAB4B>new Neighbor</color> might want to
move to our Astralink, hoho..."
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: Travel with your Lumia Bottle!
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
......Hm?
Hmm...!
       <size=30>Lumia and the car are a perfect match!</size>
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content: Yeah! Though I have no idea what it's for...
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2
介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
And hey! You might even "discover" someone~!
That's right, you'll run into
traveling <color=#8AAB4B>new Neighbors</color> along the way.
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Alright... huh?
You didn't bring any Lumia flasks with you, did you?
You won't be able to drive and explore without enough Lumia.
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
Mobai just told me that
we can all go on a trip to the unknown world~!
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2

content:
Something feels off...{短暂停}But anyway, with the <color=#8AAB4B>Lumia Bottle</color>, 
you've got Lumia power - nothing can stop you now!
Would <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> like to go out and give it a try?
info: 介绍流光瓶-莎莎_主流程文本2
